revision.comment: Updated article to match with the Zandronum wiki.
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:{{PAGENAMEE}}}} {{STFeature}} '''A_CheckRailReload''' (void) {{deprecated}} Jumps to Fire+8 if this function has not been called for the fourth time. It also checks if there is ammo left for the weapon. This function must only be used on the [[Classes:Railgun|Skulltag railgun]] and therefore is deprecated. '''Warning:''' This function is limited to Skulltag's railgun and it's derived classes! ==Examples== 
Fire:
    RLGG E 12 A_FireRailgun
    RLGG F 6 A_CheckRailReload
    RLGG G 6
    RLGG H 6
    RLGG I 6
    RLGG J 6
    RLGG K 6
    RLGG L 6
    RLGG A 6
    RLGG M 0 A_ReFire
    goto Ready
== See also == * [[A_CheckForReload]] * [[A_ResetReloadCounter]]
